attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
bring back the death penalty fer folks that post links to these ear pertition on LZ

there are a growing number of sad gits posting links to these pointless pertitions on wur website and we dint like nor want them. so can tony, er, that new one, make it illegal to do so in future

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
